name: Time of Hip Hop
description:
Ever imagined having the most famous record label in Hip Hop?

Travel back in time, and seize the opportunity to discover Tupac, Eminem, Kanye, and other aspiring rappers and hip hop artists before they’re even known. Meet influential people in the industry and grow your record label to be the most famous and dominating force in 2020 and beyond!

* The Story Begins with having 1 artist and your recording studio — sign artists, take on proteges and grow your label over time

* Make Choices!
--- Make connections to get into exclusive nightclubs, private parties, and even get a chance to join Wu-Tang Clan and other hip hop collectives!
--- Take on proteges and train them until they are ready to debut
--- Invest in studios, venues, and record companies to earn more money for your label

* See the Hip Hop culture boom over Time!

Build your Record Label today! 100% free, no In-App Purchases!
